\w The|strong="H5221"\w* wicked man being; scourged, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* fool shall be wiser: \w but|strong="H5221"\w* if thou \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* wise man \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w will|strong="H0995"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w discipline|strong="H5221"\w*.
